items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 95 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 20!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 25 check-ins with a photo.

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 100 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 21!

Hazy and white like a winter storm, but best enjoyed on a warm sunny day. This specific style of wheat beer brings with it a subtle mix of spices and hops, giving it a distinct flavor with little bitterness. That's 5 different beers categorized as a Witbier. Try 5 more for Level 2!

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 10 different beers with the style of IPA - New England (Imperial or Single), Pale Ale - New England or IPA - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 3!

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 30 different venues categorized as a Brewery. Visit 5 more different ones for Level 7!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 120 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 25!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 185 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 38.

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 29)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 30!
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three Thursdays in a 30 day period!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 70 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 15!
One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 60 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 13!

It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 15 different beers with the style of Fruit Beer or Sour - Fruited. Try 5 more for Level 4.

items.comment: Yep, great lemon flavor. Definitely was refreshing on a hot summer day.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 85 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 18!
It's time for Summer! It's that time of year where you hit the beach and crack open your favorite Summer brew! That's at least 5 different Summer beers try 5 more for Level 2!
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 25 different Pale Ales. Try 5 more for Level 6.

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 180 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 37.

items.checkin_comment: A little too much grapefruit compared to the passion fruit.

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 95 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 20!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 25 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 6!

items.checkin_comment: Good balance, not too strong on the old bay.

beer.beer_name: Dead Rise Old Bay Summer Ale

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 115 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 24!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 25 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 6.

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 175 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 36.

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 27)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 28!

When a single isn’t enough, make it a double. Doubling the hops and malts in a recipe results in a higher ABV and can pack quite a boozey punch. That's 5 different beers with the style that contains Imperial / Double in its style name. Try 5 more for Level 2!
Congrats on your love of good beer and drinking at Frisco Tap House. Keep checking in beers at both locations to level up the Frisco Tap House badge!
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three Thursdays in a 30 day period!

items.checkin_comment: Great job on the world cup win USWNT

items.badge_description: The 2019 Women's World Cup is here and the people across the globe are joining together to celebrate and enjoy some great beers. Goooooaaaaalllll!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking opening a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 20 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 5!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 20 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 5!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 70 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 15!

items.checkin_comment: A good wheat bear, not to overpowering with the mango flavor.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 80 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 17!
Happy 4th of July! It's nice to see you are celebrating the holiday with good beers, but don't forget to celebrate with good company and good food!

What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 5 different beers that have been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 2!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 170 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 35.

items.checkin_comment: Great brew, but the lemon flavor seems to overpower any of the flavor from the orange peel.

It may not be cloudy outside, but your brew definitely is! That’s at least 5 different hefeweizens. Try 5 more to unlock Level 2.

items.checkin_comment: Subtle bourbon flavor. I like this one better than the unaged version.

items.badge_description: Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 1 year on Untappd!

items.comment: Yep, they were. Probably the best one I've had from them. They also have a barrel aged version.
